title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.12 - Responsibility of owner and tenant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.12 - Responsibility of owner and tenant

State Regulations
(a) Responsibility. (1)

The owner shall be responsible for the
observance and punishable for the nonobservance of the following sections, anything in any lease to the contrary notwithstanding, namely: 8-1.2, 8-1.3, 8-1.4, 8-1.6 (subd. [a]), 8-1.7, 8-1.8, 8-1.10, 8-1.11, 8-1.13, 8-1.14, 8-1.15, 8-1.16, 8-1.17, 8-1.18, 8-1.19, 8-1.20, 8-1.21, 8-1.22, 8-1.23, 8-1.24, 8-1.26, 8-1.27, 8-1.28, 8-1.29, 8-1.30, 8-1.31, 8-1.32, 8-1.33, 8-1.34, 8-1.35, 8-1.36, 8-1.37, 8-1.38, 8-1.39, 8-1.40, 8-1.41, 8-1.42 (subd. [a], par. [1]; subd. [b]), 8-1.43, 8-1.44, 8-1.45, 8-1.48, 8- 1.49, 8-1.50, 8-1.51, 8-1.52 (subd. [b]), 8-1.53, 8-1.55, 8-1.56, 8-1.57, 8- 1.58, 8-1.59, 8-1.60, 8-1.61, 8-1.62. (2)

Both the owner and the
tenant shall be responsible for the observance and punishable for the
nonobservance of the following sections, anything in any lease to the contrary
notwithstanding, namely: 8-1.5, 8-1.6 (subd. [b]), 8-1.9, 8-1.25, 8-1.42 (subd. [a], pars. [2], [3]), 8-1.46, 8-1.47, 8-1.52 (subds. [a], [c], [d]), 8-1.54. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
